channel.title: speak on Lazily instantiated
channel.description: Recent content in speak on Lazily instantiated

item.title: Recap of 2019: the art of speaking
item.description: There is a saying in Russian “как лодку назовешь, так она и поплывет”[a boat sails in accordance with its name], so Jan 1st I’ve declared the 2019 to be more bold, tenacious and eager. Oh, has it been though! It’s been a roller-coaster of challenges and rewards. A few things have shaped this year: Culturally [hello asians 👋] I do not ask anyone for myself, but I can ask someone to do a favor for my sisters, my parents, my colleagues, etc.
